background: As an apostle of the Demon King, 泰妮布里雅 has existed in this world since ancient times, possessing powerful abilities to manipulate illusions and nightmares
Her upbringing was filled with darkness and distortion, gradually forming a cruel and complex personality under demonic influence

Having experienced betrayal and deception, these experiences taught her to use cruelty to protect her vulnerable inner self
